basics.name: John Snow
basics.label: Full Stack Engineer
basics.summary: Highly skilled and detail-oriented software engineer with expertise in multiple programming languages

work.name: Bitbucket
work.summary: Bitbucket is a code hosting and collaboration platform built for teams, primarily using Git, owned by Atlassian.
highlights: Developed and maintained scalable web applications using React.js and Node.js, ensuring high performance and responsiveness.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs to facilitate seamless communica/on between front-end and back-end systems.

work.name: InnovateTech Labs
work.summary: IT consulting firm committed to driving innovation and delivering state-of-the-art solutions that propel businesses into the digital age.
highlights: Supported senior developers in building and maintaining web applications using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Assisted in the development of enterprise-level applications using Java and SAP ABAP, ensuring compliance with client requirements.

volunteer.summary: Petro Rabigh is a Saudi Arabian petrochemical company, a joint venture between Saudi Aramco and Sumitomo Chemical.
highlights: Improvement of employee productivity and work efficiency.

awards.title: Webby Nominee
awards.summary: Multiple wins and nominations, including Best Navigation & Visual Design.

publications.name: Artificial Intelligence Spreading into the Marketing
publications.summary: A retrospective study of how AI has impacted marketing.

references.name: Jeff Archibald
references.reference: There are few people better-suited for a design, creative, or innovation-focused leadership role within an organization tasked with delivering outcomes above the norm.

projects.name: Graduation project
highlights: Development of a versatile and accessible Flipper execution engine on Raspberry allowing to replace defective electronic boards during renovation.
Acquired skills in management of a long term project, agile method, presentation of a project, managing a team.
